Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset 8.1

Posted onSeptember 29, 2014December 30, 2014Leave a comment

Microsoft Diagnostics and Recovery Toolset (DaRT) 8.1 helps you troubleshoot and repair Windows-based computers. This includes those computers that cannot be started. DaRT 8.1 is a powerful set of tools that extend the Windows Recovery Environment (WinRE). By using DaRT, you can analyze an issue to determine its cause, for example, by inspecting the computer’s Read More …
